enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: IMPACT OF SINGLE PROJECTS ON EMISSIONS IN THE COMMITMENT PERIOD
sentences: Chair Plougman reported that consultations on this issue had resulted in 'an almost agreed' draft decision (FCCC/SBSTA/2000/CRP.13).
SBSTA adopted its draft conclusions on this issue.
